content: this pattern uses us crochet terminology the number in brackets at the end of the round is how many stitches you should have completed this pattern is worked in continuous rounds following this pattern using the recommended hook and yarn size will result in a finished item approx 8cm wide x 8cm tall if you have any questions please don t hesitate to message us on instagram or etsy difficulty super easy please tag us in your finished item photos on instagram @dandyknots we would love to see them check out our site for more patterns blog posts and more https //dandyknots com/
